channel.title: Omg my runserver help instant admin or possible rs2gp
channel.description:
Well i get this when i do run server and it keeps saying im already logged in
Starting "MYSERVERNAME" Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28)
Btw i don't wanna tell anyone my server yet it is still to be released. Except for the helper that reads below. I am a pretty good coder (helped code on many servers-kickasskids-mikescape-and some others but this is the second time its happeneed to me on 2 servers so instead of starting another one i'll try solve it this time. Anyone that helps gets instant admin or possilby rs2 gp on how fast they help me.
Thanks, come visit here http://brunescapeforum.runboard.com

item.title: Omg my runserver help instant admin or possible rs2gp
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

THe lines in my compiler.

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

That always meant my compiler was working. But once i edited my summon.CFG and item.CFG. It fucked up bad.

That worked but now I got an error in my umm summon file I think i know what I did wrong there.

Starting MYSERVER Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
config\objects.cfg: file not found.
Summoning: Loading monsters from Summon.cfg ...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 101
        at Summoning.applyConfig(Summoning.java:156)
        at Summoning.LoadMonsters(Summoning.java:230)
        at Summoning.<init>(Summoning.java:33)
        at SkillHandler.<init>(SkillHandler.java:11)
        at server.main(server.java:34)

item.title: Omg my runserver help instant admin or possible rs2gp
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

Line 28 of server.java

playerHandler = new PlayerHandler(); npcHandler = new NPCHandler(); ---->>> itemHandler = new ItemHandler(); shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); antilag = new antilag();

And 312 of item handler.

Oh fuck that one I posted for 312 was wrong I edit.

int[] Bonuses = new int[12];
				for (int i = 0; i < 12; i++) {
---->>>>						if (token3[(6 + i)] != null) {
							Bonuses[i] = Integer.parseInt(token3[(6 + i)]);
						}

This is line 312 (look up)

(down is line 39)

for(int i = 0; i < MaxListedItems; i++) {
			ItemList[i] = null;
		}
-->>>		loadItemList("item.cfg");
		//loadDrops("drops.cfg");
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Omg my runserver help instant admin or possible rs2gp
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

Ok then i think thats screwed as well im up to300 i think

i’ll do the arrow thingie again ------>>>>

[code]duelz.closeInterface();
duelz.resetItems(3214);
duelz.resetDuel();
RemoveAllDuelItems();
sendMessage(“You decline the duel.”);
closeInterface();
---->> resetItems(3214);
resetDuel();
return true;
}

    public void RemoveAllDuelItems() {
	for (int i = 0; i < duelItems.length; i++) {
		if (duelItems[i] > 0) {
			fromDuel((duelItems[i] - 1), i, duelItemsN[i]);
		}
	}
   }[/code]

It is within those 5 lines might not of pressed down for one and the status bar won’t work as well wierd. I’ll try to fix.

FUCK FUCK BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEP sorry for da swearing but nooooooooooooooooo I can’t find the client handler bit. I was playing it about 10mins beforehand and then I edited some stuff by putting in some talking NPC’s and some commands. Now it just won’t ****ing work!!!

item.title: Omg my runserver help instant admin or possible rs2gp
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

This is in the itemhandler.java

I will put an arrow to line 39 this is the arrow (----------->>>>>)

public ItemHandler() { for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) { globalItemController[i] = 0; globalItemID[i] = 0; globalItemX[i] = 0; globalItemY[i] = 0; globalItemAmount[i] = 0; globalItemTicks[i] = 0; globalItemStatic[i] = false; ----------->>>>> } for(int i = 0; i < MaxDropItems; i++) { ResetItem(i); } for(int i = 0; i < MaxListedItems; i++) { ItemList[i] = null; } loadItemList("item.cfg"); //loadDrops("drops.cfg"); }

This is in the server.java arrow pointing to line 28

[code]public static void main(java.lang.String args[]) {
clientHandler = new server();
(new Thread(clientHandler)).start(); //
----------->>>>> launch server listener

	playerHandler = new PlayerHandler();
	npcHandler = new NPCHandler();
	itemHandler = new ItemHandler();[/code]

And I will be in the progress of going to line 312 in itemhandler.java as well

Thanks[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 04:33:45 AM[/size][hr]I didn’t mean in real ‘touch’ I said I hope I can get this solved and speak to you about other errors and I hope your server is successful. I been working hard on mine and I hope i don’t have to start from scratch again.

I have had a couple of friends that have had a way around this but theres weren’t as similiar to this.

Read full topic
